text: Cozia may refer to several places in Romania: *Cozia Monastery, Vâlcea County *Cozia Mountains, Vâlcea County *Cozia National Park, Vâlcea County * Cozia, a village in Cornereva Commune, Caraș-Severin County * Cozia, a village in Cârjiți Commune, Hunedoara County * Cozia, a village in Costuleni Commune, Iași County * Cozia, a village in Pristol Commune, Mehedinți County * Cozia (river), a tributary of the Bohotin in Iași County
title: Cozia
